name: Hunter's Moon (itch) (RileeHorowitz, Blackthorn Studios)
description: Our half-finished submission for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. Overscoping is a jammers worst nightmare, and I'm just really glad that Emma and I got most of the core gameplay loop we envisioned finished. There will most certainly be more to come from this project (like a better name) so stay tuned, and thanks for playing!
